      限定符和类型 接口和说明

      Message stores which has flush operation

      Message store

      Message store which stores data by partition
      实现BasicMessageStore的org.apache.giraph.comm.messages中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ByteArrayMessagesPerVertexStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Implementation of SimpleMessageStore where multiple messages are stored per vertex as byte arrays.
      class  DiskBackedMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Message storage with in-memory map of messages and with support for flushing all the messages to the disk.
      class  DiskBackedMessageStoreByPartition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Message store which separates data by partitions, and submits them to underlying message store.
      class  OneMessagePerVertexStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Implementation of SimpleMessageStore where we have a single message per vertex.
      class  SequentialFileMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Used for writing and reading collection of messages to the disk.
      class  SimpleMessageStore<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,T>
      Abstract class for MessageStoreByPartition which allows any kind of object to hold messages for one vertex.
